DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Phase III trial confirm efficacy intravaginal dehydroepiandrosterone ( DHEA ) postmenopausal woman vaginal atrophy .
DOC.brief_title: DHEA Against Vaginal Atrophy - 3-Month Efficacy Study
DOC.criteria: Main Postmenopausal woman ( hysterectomized nonhysterectomized ) Women 40 75 year age . Willing participate study sign inform consent . Women selfidentified symptom ( ) vaginal atrophy . For nonhysterectomized woman , willing endometrial biopsy screen end study . Main Undiagnosed abnormal genital bleeding .
